about_the_game:
Years later, humanity finally unraveled some of the secrets of black holes and achieved faster-than-light cosmic travel through wormholes. Interstellar airports began to emerge, and "Cosmic Lighthouse" was one of them. You will play as an inexperienced diviner, providing fortune-telling services to stranded travelers at the airport, answering their questions, and earning a living in the process.

The travelers in the airport are diverse, each facing different circumstances and worries. You need to interpret the hexagrams to help them find solutions to their problems, and your approach will subtly influence their destinies. Will you become a warm light in the universe, or a ruthless legendary diviner? The choice is yours!

The game's fortune-telling mechanics are entirely based on the traditional Chinese divination system "Meihua Yishu," aiming to provide the most authentic fortune-telling experience—what you learn can truly be applied in real life!

short_description: This is a pixel-art AVG game that combines fortune-telling with a sci-fi theme! Players will take on the role of a diviner at the "Cosmic Lighthouse" airport, providing fortune-telling services to travelers and answering their questions as a way to make a living and strive to survive.
